# Sharp-Tkinter-Window-High-DPI

Resolve blurred tkinter text + scaling on Windows 10 high DPI displays

## Installation

```sh
```

## Usage

```python
from hdpitkinter import HdpiTk

root = HdpiTk()
root.mainloop()
```
